name: Ashes
description: Casey Powell, a woman from the United States, was addicted to eating her husband's ashes.

name: Glass
description: Michel Lotito, also known as 'Mr. Eat-All,' consumed metal, glass, rubber, and other indigestible materials. He had a rare condition known as pica.

name: Metal
description: A man from India gained media attention for his habit of eating metal, including knives and forks.

name: Bricks
description: A man from India claimed to have been eating bricks, gravel, and mud for over 20 years due to a rare medical condition.
